project.name: Gasyard
project.description: Intent-based, cross-VM bridge enabling fast, seamless asset transfers across EVM, Solana & more.
project.longDescription: Gasyard is a cross-chain payment and bridge protocol designed to make asset transfers across multiple blockchains fast, seamless, and simple. Whether you're moving liquidity between EVM chains, Move-based chains, Solana, or even Hyperliquid, Gasyard lets you bridge in under 10 seconds.

features.title: Cross-Chain Bridging
features.description: Transfer assets between EVM and non-EVM chains in ~10 seconds with low slippage and fair fees.

features.title: Collateral Credits Clearing (CCC)
features.description: Off-chain settlement system between solvers while guaranteeing on-chain liquidity for users.

features.title: Gas On Demand (GOD)
features.description: Deposit USDC once and instantly access any supported token on any chain without repeated bridging.

features.title: Intent-based Architecture
features.description: Optimal routing and settlement through solver networks for the best execution.

project.currentStatus: Live on multiple chains including MegaETH.

steps.title: Connect Your Wallet
steps.content:
1. Visit app.gasyard.fi
2. Click on 'Connect Wallet' in the top right corner
3. Select your preferred wallet (Metamask, WalletConnect, or others)
4. Ensure you have enough gas tokens for the source chain transaction

steps.title: Configure Your Bridge
steps.content:
1. Select your source network (the chain you're sending from)
2. Choose your destination chain
3. Enter the amount you want to bridge
4. Select the token you wish to transfer
5. Review the quote, fees, and destination wallet address

steps.title: Execute and Track
steps.content:
1. Confirm the transaction to initiate the bridge
2. Gasyard will route your intent to the best solver
3. Track your bridge status directly in the app
4. Use the provided explorer links to verify the transaction on both chains
5. The transfer typically completes in ~10 seconds

steps.title: Using Gas On Demand (GOD)
steps.content:
Gas On Demand allows you to:
• Deposit USDC once and access any supported token on any chain
• Avoid repeated bridging operations
• Get real-time liquidity at low fees
• Perfect for power users, AI agents, and dApps requiring instant liquidity

steps.title: Understanding CCC System
steps.content:
The Collateral Credits Clearing system works as follows:
• Users lock assets in the source chain
• Solvers mint Credits on the destination chain (1:1 USDC backing)
• Credits can be converted back to USDC by solvers
• System ensures rapid settlement with reduced on-chain costs

requirements: Gas tokens for source chain transactions
